featured.text: The profits of Prince Charles’s organic farm go to _____ to help the poor and the sick.
English explorers found out that Indian princes also carried umbrellas on the east coast of North America.

definition.zh_def: 王子；君主的兒子或女兒，通常是繼承王位的候選人。
definition.en_def: A male member of a royal family, especially the son of a king or queen.
definition.example: The prince attended the charity event to support local children.
